Text: Me̩ gbʼe-i, ame̩ amone̩ du!
tʼabo ki chʼo̩wo̩ wane̩, tʼabo ki dago,
Alu-mi aka e̩wñ ibe;
Nahi eti-mi wane̩ ñw ita ku ma kpa;
E̩wñ chi kʼu narailo adiko e̩bie̩ne̩ ta?
Ma ke̩do̩no e̩wñ anana ku ma ne̩
I nʼe̩ne̩ du ki neke la o̩maye-wñ tane̩ n,
todu alaja onugo-ma ela tane̩ chʼekpuna,
todu kʼowñ kʼi deju o̩pioo,
Todu i ali ka kʼamanibe aku,
Ibe ki dʼef uma ka kʼunyi-ma ado̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩,
I chaka chʼone̩ ki nʼojima i la akpo̩kpe̩ n,
O̩na ku ma le-i chʼidada-ma,
Ma ko ma jo̩ ñw o̩jegu dab ame̩wño̩re̩ egini;
O̩jo̩ muda ala onugo-mi tane̩ kwef o̩wo̩ o̩jegu,
One̩ mud anana, kʼojima unyi-wñ ki nana nyʼo̩gba,
Todu i leku i ako e̩wñ du alo n;
Dagba kʼi chaka kʼaduwa ñw onugo o̩la-wñ e̩gba kʼi deju,
I alo tef o̩gbo̩gba amata-wñ,
One̩ kʼi nʼojima, kʼi ma muda mʼoji e̩wñ n,
